name: Japanese Ukiyo-e
prompt: A VibeDeck controller painted in Japanese Ukiyo-e woodblock print style. The Great Wave off Kanagawa wrapping around the body. Cherry blossom branches across the surface. Mount Fuji on one side. Traditional indigo blue and white colors with red accents. The texture looks like printed on textured washi paper. Buttons are mon (family crest) designs. The rotary knob has a chrysanthemum pattern. Soft diffused lighting like a museum display.
why: Classic art, Japanese aesthetic, timeless beauty
